46 struct MillikanWhiteModelData::Impl
47 {
48  size_t index = 0;
49  double mw = 0.0;
50  double omegav = 1.0E-20; // m^2
51  Eigen::ArrayXd a;
52  Eigen::ArrayXd b;
53 
54  Impl(size_t size) : a(size), b(size) { }
55 };
56 
57 
58 MillikanWhiteModelData::MillikanWhiteModelData(
59  const class Thermodynamics& thermo, size_t index, double thetav
60 ) :
61  m_impl(std::make_unique<Impl>(thermo.nHeavy()))
62 {
63  m_impl->index = index;
64  m_impl->mw = thermo.speciesMw(index);
65 
66  // Fill in default values
67  double theta_power = std::pow(thetav, 4.0/3.0);
68  size_t offset = (thermo.hasElectrons() ? 1 : 0);
69 
70  for (size_t i = 0; i < thermo.nHeavy(); ++i)
71  {
72  double mwi = thermo.speciesMw(i+offset);
73  double mu = 1000.0*m_impl->mw*mwi/(m_impl->mw + mwi); // reduced mass in g/mol
74  m_impl->a[i] = 1.16E-3*std::sqrt(mu)*theta_power;
75  m_impl->b[i] = 0.015*std::pow(mu, 0.25);
76  }
77 }
78 
79 MillikanWhiteModelData::MillikanWhiteModelData(const MillikanWhiteModelData& rhs)
80  : m_impl(nullptr)
81 {
82  if (rhs.m_impl)
83  m_impl = std::make_unique<Impl>(*rhs.m_impl);
84 }
85 
86 MillikanWhiteModelData& MillikanWhiteModelData::operator=(MillikanWhiteModelData rhs)
87 {
88  if (!rhs.m_impl)
89  m_impl.reset();
90  else if (!m_impl)
91  m_impl = std::make_unique<Impl>(*rhs.m_impl);
92  else
93  *m_impl = *rhs.m_impl;
94 
95  return *this;
96 }
97

99

104 size_t MillikanWhiteModelData::speciesIndex() const { return m_impl->index; }
105 
106 double MillikanWhiteModelData::molecularWeight() const { return m_impl->mw; }
107 
108 Eigen::ArrayXd& MillikanWhiteModelData::a() { return m_impl->a; }

110 const Eigen::ArrayXd& MillikanWhiteModelData::a() const { return m_impl->a; }

114 const Eigen::ArrayXd& MillikanWhiteModelData::b() const { return m_impl->b; }
115 
116 MillikanWhiteModelData& MillikanWhiteModelData::setReferenceCrossSection(double omegav)
117 {
118  assert(omegav >= 0.0);
119  m_impl->omegav = omegav;
120  return *this;
121 }
122 
123 double MillikanWhiteModelData::referenceCrossSection() const { return m_impl->omegav; }
124 
125 double MillikanWhiteModelData::limitingCrossSection(const double& T) const
126 {
127  // Park high temperature correction
128  return m_impl->omegav * (2.5E9/(T*T)); // 2.5E9 = 50,000^2
129 }
130 
131 MillikanWhiteModel::MillikanWhiteModel(const MillikanWhiteModelData& data) :
132  m_data(data)
133 { }
134 
135 
136 double MillikanWhiteModel::relaxationTime(
137  const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo) const
138 {
139  // Millikan-White model for average relaxation time
140  const Eigen::Map<const Eigen::ArrayXd> Xh(
141  thermo.X()+(thermo.hasElectrons() ? 1 : 0), thermo.nHeavy());
142  const double T_fac = std::pow(thermo.T(), -1.0/3.0);
143  const double p_atm = thermo.P() / ONEATM;
144  const double tau_mw =
145  (Xh*(m_data.a()*(T_fac - m_data.b()) - 18.42).exp()).sum() /
146  (Xh.sum()*p_atm);
147 
148  // Park correction
149  const double ni = thermo.numberDensity() * thermo.X()[m_data.speciesIndex()];
150  const double ci = std::sqrt(8*RU*thermo.T()/(PI*m_data.molecularWeight()));
151  const double tau_park = 1.0/(ni * ci * m_data.limitingCrossSection(thermo.T()));
152 
153  return tau_mw + tau_park;
154 }
155 
156 
157 struct MillikanWhiteModelDB::Data
158 {
159  const class Thermodynamics& thermo;
160  XmlDocument database;
161  XmlElement::const_iterator millikan_white_xml;
162 
163  Data(const class Thermodynamics& thermo, std::string file_path) :
164  thermo(thermo), database(file_path)
165  {
166  auto& root = database.root();
167  millikan_white_xml = root.findTag("Millikan-White");
168 
169  if (millikan_white_xml == root.end())
170  root.parseError("Could not find Millikan-White element.");
171  }
172 };
173

175 MillikanWhiteModelDB::MillikanWhiteModelDB(
176  const class Thermodynamics& thermo
177 ) :
178  MillikanWhiteModelDB(thermo, databaseFileName("VT.xml", "transfer"))
179 { }

182 MillikanWhiteModelDB::MillikanWhiteModelDB(
183  const class Thermodynamics& thermo, std::string file_path
184 ) :
185  m_data(std::make_shared<Data>(thermo, file_path))
186 { }
187 
188 
189 MillikanWhiteModel MillikanWhiteModelDB::create(
190  std::string species_name, double theta)
191 {
192  // Create default data
193  MillikanWhiteModelData data(
194  m_data->thermo, m_data->thermo.speciesIndex(species_name), theta);
195 
196  // Find species in database
197  auto species_iter = m_data->millikan_white_xml->findTagWithAttribute(
198  "vibrator", "species", species_name);
199 
200  // If species not in database, return default model
201  if (species_iter == m_data->millikan_white_xml->end())
202  return { data };
203 
204  // Use reference cross section if provided
205  if (species_iter->hasAttribute("omegav"))
206  data.setReferenceCrossSection(species_iter->getAttribute<double>("omegav"));
207 
208  // Loop over each heavy species in thermo
209  size_t offset = (m_data->thermo.hasElectrons() ? 1 : 0);
210 
211  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_data->thermo.nHeavy(); ++i)
212  {
213  auto partner_iter = species_iter->findTagWithAttribute(
214  "partner", "species", m_data->thermo.speciesName(i+offset));
215 
216  if (partner_iter != species_iter->end())
217  {
218  partner_iter->getAttribute("a", data.a()[i], "must provide constant a!");
219  partner_iter->getAttribute("b", data.b()[i], "must provide constant b!");
220  }
221  }
222 
223  return { data };
224 }
